name: The Only Way to Win
description:
A two player game about two Mecha who are opposing weapons in a war that neither controls.

"You are each mecha on opposing sides of a war. The conflict is not yours, but the people are. You care about them. You are a tool capable of incredible destruction, but you need pilots to make that possible. You are impossible to destroy in combat. The same is not true of your pilots.

The war will only end when one of you is Victorious."

Image: Project Ivy Nuclear Test public domain image, October 31, 1952
